channel.title: Debian on Showfom's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Debian on Showfom's Blog

item.title: How to Install Nginx, MySQL and PHP (LEMP Stack) on Debian 9 / Debian 8
item.description: Debian 9 Stretch was released on June 18, 2017. Because it’s the latest operating system, the old LEMP (Linux + Nginx + MySQL + PHP) installation tutorials based on Dotdeb have become obsolete. This article will demonstrate how to install the latest version of LEMP on Debian 9.x Stretch using both official and third-party repositories. You will be able to select your preferred version of PHP. This article is also applicable to Debian 8.
